title: Stocks Hold Near Record, Silver at All-Time High: Markets Wrap
description: Global stocks held near a record amid thin trading while silver climbed to a new peak to extend a historic end-of-year rally.
content: Global stocks held near a record amid thin trading while silver climbed to a new peak to extend a historic end-of-year rally.
